_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Hytale
author: 161775222+JoanFo1456@users.noreply.github.com
description:
Set out on an adventure built for both creation and play. Hytale blends the freedom of a sandbox
with the momentum of an RPG: explore a procedurally generated world full of dungeons, secrets, and a
variety of creatures, then shape it block by block.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

echo '============================================'
echo 'Hytale Server Installation'
echo '============================================'

echo '[1/2] Creating directories...'
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Backups
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Server/mods
mkdir -p /mnt/server/Server/earlyplugins
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.server-backups/release
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.server-backups/pre-release
echo '  ✓ Directories created'

echo '[2/2] Creating config.json...'
cat > /mnt/server/Server/config.json << 'EOF'
{
  "Version": 4,
  "ServerName": "Hytale Server",
  "MOTD": "",
  "Password": "",
  "MaxPlayers": 20,
  "MaxViewRadius": 12,
  "Defaults": {
    "World": "default",
    "GameMode": "Adventure"
  },
  "ConnectionTimeouts": {
    "InitialTimeout": "PT1M",
    "AuthTimeout": "PT1M30S"
  },
  "RateLimit": {},
  "Modules": {},
  "LogLevels": {
    "AssetModule|P": "SEVERE",
    "AssetRegistryLoader": "SEVERE",
    "AssetStore|AssignmentsAsset": "SEVERE",
    "AssetStore|BiomeAsset": "SEVERE",
    "AssetStore|BlockType": "SEVERE",
    "AssetStore|CustomConnectedBlockTemplateAsset": "SEVERE",
    "AssetStore|EntityEffect": "SEVERE",
    "AssetStore|Environment": "SEVERE",
    "AssetStore|GameplayConfig": "SEVERE",
    "AssetStore|Interaction": "SEVERE",
    "AssetStore|Item": "SEVERE",
    "AssetStore|ModelVFX": "SEVERE",
    "AssetStore|ParticleSystem": "SEVERE",
    "AssetStore|PrefabListAsset": "SEVERE",
    "AssetStore|ScriptedBrushAsset": "SEVERE",
    "AssetStore|WorldStructureAsset": "SEVERE",
    "BarterShopState": "SEVERE",
    "BlockSetModule|P": "SEVERE",
    "BuilderToolsPacketHandler": "SEVERE",
    "CertificateUtil": "SEVERE",
    "CollisionModule|P": "SEVERE",
    "CommonAssetModule|P": "SEVERE",
    "ConsoleModule|P": "SEVERE",
    "EncryptedAuthCredentialStore": "SEVERE",
    "Entity": "SEVERE",
    "HandshakeHandler": "SEVERE",
    "Hytale": "SEVERE",
    "HytaleGenerator": "SEVERE",
    "HytaleGenerator|P": "SEVERE",
    "HytaleServer": "INFO",
    "I18nModule|P": "SEVERE",
    "JWTValidator": "SEVERE",
    "LoginTiming": "SEVERE",
    "MacroCommandBase": "SEVERE",
    "NPC|P": "SEVERE",
    "PasswordPacketHandler": "SEVERE",
    "PathWatcherThread": "SEVERE",
    "PlayerSavingSystems": "SEVERE",
    "PluginExample|P": "INFO",
    "PluginManager": "INFO",
    "QUICTransport": "SEVERE",
    "SERR": "SEVERE",
    "ServerAuthManager": "SEVERE",
    "ServerManager|P": "SEVERE",
    "SessionServiceClient": "SEVERE",
    "Shop|P": "SEVERE",
    "Spawning|P": "SEVERE",
    "Teleport|P": "SEVERE",
    "Universe|P": "SEVERE",
    "World|default": "SEVERE",
    "World|default|M": "SEVERE",
    "WorldGenerator": "SEVERE",
    "WorldMapTracker": "SEVERE"
  },
  "Mods": {},
  "DisplayTmpTagsInStrings": false,
  "PlayerStorage": {
    "Type": "Hytale"
  },
  "Update": {}
}
EOF
echo '  ✓ config.json created'

echo 'Installation complete!'
echo '============================================'
echo 'Installed components:'
echo '  - Base directories'
echo '  - config.json'
echo '============================================'

variables.name: Auto Update
variables.description: Automatically update game files on startup.

variables.name: Patchline
variables.description: Server branch to run (release or pre-release).

variables.name: Server Version
variables.description: Version to run: latest, previous or a specific version (e.g. 2026.01.29-301e13929).

variables.name: Pre-Authentication
variables.description: Pre-authenticate via OAuth2 before server start.

variables.name: Enable World Backups
variables.description: Enable automatic world backups by the game server.

variables.name: Enable Server Backup
variables.description: Store a backup of the previous server version on update or patchline change (single rollback slot per patchline, configurable via SERVER_BACKUP_RETENTION).

variables.name: Server Backup Retention
variables.description: Number of server version backups to retain per patchline.

variables.name: Use AOT Cache
variables.description: Enable Ahead-Of-Time compilation cache for faster startup.

variables.name: Compact Object Headers
variables.description: Enable JVM compact object headers for reduced memory usage.

variables.name: Allow Self-OP
variables.description: Allow players to use /op self to grant themselves operator permissions.

variables.name: Load Early Plugins
variables.description: Loads binary injection plugins for the server, enable only if you understand the stability risks.

variables.name: Disable Sentry
variables.description: Disable Sentry error reporting and telemetry.

variables.name: Downloader Timeout
variables.description: Maximum time in seconds for server file downloads, increase for slow connections.

variables.name: Profile UUID
variables.description: Specify a specific Hytale profile UUID for the servers session.
